Fuzzy Results

This flow will trigger when there is no exact company name match from one or more data sources. It is to get user's help in creating a relationship for similar company names.

Demo

Select company names that match with Adobe Inc (what's this?):

Adobe Systems Adobe Systems Incorporated Padobe Cradobe Innovations

Source: Pitchbook (Adobe Inc)

Name

Adobe Inc

Description

Adobe Inc. is an American multinational computer software company. Incorporated in Delaware and headquartered in San Jose, California, it has historically focused upon the creation of multimedia and creativity software products, with a more recent foray towards digital marketing software.

Go to External Link
